data.content:
adjective
or chiefly Brit collectable
[more ~; most ~] :good for a collection :considered valuable by collectors
The shop sells antiques and various collectible items.
That kind of toy is very collectible [=popular with collectors] right now.
noun
or chiefly Brit collectable , pl -ibles
[count] :something that is considered valuable by collectors and usually kept as part of a group of similar things :a collectible thing
She displays her collectibles in a glass case.
